vote.header_og_description: Vote on this poll! Create one youself to quicly and effortlessly share nice looking polls to your friends, then collect all their responses.

vote.social_share_text: Could you vote on this poll for me? 🙂📩

results.header_og_description: Check out how this poll did! Create one youself to quicly and effortlessly share nice looking polls to your friends, then collect all their responses.
results.social_share_text: Check out how this poll did! 💪😁

translate.title: Help translate Questionary
translate.p1: Questionary is a small and personal project of an Italian web developer.
translate.p2: The time and resources to get the website translated in as many languages as possible are, obviously, limited. For this reason, the community is one of the most precious things a developed has.
translate.p3: If you would like to contribute, please consider downloading the file below, containing all the currently available languages as a .zip archive. The translations are JSON files.
translate.p4: Then, create a copy of any file and replace the existing text with the new translation. Be mindful not to change the first section of each id and text pair.
translate.p5: Ultimately, send the translated file to

hiddenResults.title: You cannot see the results without voting
hiddenResults.description: The creator of this poll decided to hide the results of this poll until you have voted.

errors.header_og_description: Something didn't work out right... But with md-polls you can quicly and effortlessly share nice looking polls with your friends, then collect all their responses.
errors.message: Something did not go quite right...
errors.line1: This page fell off the truck 🚚
